summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Quality Finds e-commerce showcase website. All core functionality working correctly with minor UI issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown has overlay interception issues preventing clicks
ui_bugs.workaround: Direct category navigation via URLs works perfectly

passed_tests: All backend APIs (19/19 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, featured products, categories grid, brand story
Navigation works - Home, Collections, Our Story, Contact links
All category pages load correctly (/products/wallets, /products/jewelry, etc.)
Product detail pages show complete product info and related products
About page loads with values and process sections
Contact page loads with form and contact info sections
Contact form submission works (frontend to backend integration)
Category filtering via direct URLs works perfectly
Product showcase displays all 13 products across 5 categories
Inquire button on product pages navigates to contact form
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix category filter dropdown overlay issue in ProductsPage.jsx - the shadcn Select component has pointer event interception preventing clicks. Consider adding z-index or force click handling.
